knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(parallel)
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores()-2, outfile="")

list_results <- clusterApplyLB(cl, 1:20, function(i) {
  name <- paste("../Data/Mem_usage/time", i, ".txt", sep="")
  system(paste('free -g | cat > ', name, sep = ""))
})

stopCluster(cl)
```
